page.title: 17Mr. Guy - Market Gardener
page.content: This nursery was Mr. Guy's grand- father's plant nursery and he himself started work here at thirteen years of age. He was only eighteen when he inherited the business and he has now given it to his two daughters and their husbands. But Mr. Guy loves the place and still works all day and every day. Mr. Guy's first job is to start watering the plants at 7a.m. or earlier. Opening hours are 8a.m. till 5p.m., seven days per week. His favourite plants are Ericas and "rhodos" but he really likes them all. We asked him if he had any plants nicked (stolen). "Yes, people sneak out with litle plants under their coats. And, at night, rabbits and deer enter the nursery and damage plants.
